alert.note: Alert for Bureau; Henry; Rock Island; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 11:29PM CDT until June 25 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Quad Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Rock Island County in northwestern Illinois... Southeastern Whiteside County in northwestern Illinois... Northern Henry County in northwestern Illinois... Northwestern Bureau County in north central Illinois... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1128 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Geneseo, or 16 miles northeast of Cambridge, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Geneseo, Walnut, Wyanet, Atkinson, Annawan, Hooppole, Deer Grove, Hillsdale, Yorktown, Manlius, Mineral, New Bedford, Thomas, Leon Corners, Shady Beach and Normandy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in the Quad Cities. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
